textBeforeTable: Soft capsEdit Sorry, for the inconvenience, but this page is currently under development to make sure that it is up to the standards of today's Strength Iop. Check back soon to see the fully refurbished build. IntroductionEdit [show] Contents } document.write(' Advertisement
textAfterTable: If you can afford it, it is highly recommendend to scroll Strength and Agility. Having a nice portion of Wisdom offers higher experience gain but is not essential. Boosting Vitality seems to be needed in early level although this need diminishes later on. SpellsEdit Iop class spells Icon Name Level Element Short description Brokle 0 Brokle is the Iop's Special Spell. It maxes random effects on the person/monster this is cast on. Pressure 1 Earth Pressure inflicts Earth-type damage within a range of 3 squares. Jump 1 Jump alows the caster to travel instantly over a range of 1-5 squares.
